Detailed Description

Controlinfo for packets which are send from Physical layer to the MAC layer.

The ControlInfo contains the the DeciderResult of the Decider.

Initializes the PhyToMacControlInfo with the passed DeciderResult.

NOTE: PhyToMacControlInfo takes ownership of the passed DeciderResult!

Member Function Documentation

static cObject* PhyToMacControlInfo::setControlInfo ( cMessage *const   pMsg,
DeciderResult *const   pDeciderResult 
) [inline, static]

Attaches a "control info" structure (object) to the message pMsg.

This is most useful when passing packets between protocol layers of a protocol stack, the control info will contain the decider result.

The "control info" object will be deleted when the message is deleted. Only one "control info" structure can be attached (the second setL3ToL2ControlInfo() call throws an error).

Parameters:
pMsg The message where the "control info" shall be attached.
pDeciderResult The decider results.
